author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Attempt to find the missing hits in the partial wafers in HGCalHESilicon section of the V17 geometry

#### PR validation:

Use the runTheMatrix test workflows

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

This is a bug fix. Otherwise nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx322 Attempt to find the missing hits in the partial wafers in HGCalHESilicon section of the V17 geometry
